name: Hypha
description:
Help keep the food forest in balance as a growing mycelium network!

Mycelium is the vegetative part of a fungus, consisting of many different hypha, a fine white filament.

In Hypha grow your mycelium network by making sure you've got enough sugar, nutrients and community to keep going as long as you can.

Created by Rainer Weston, So-Young Cho and Joshua Murphy for the REGENERATE Game Jam.

Audio by Mings: https://freesound.org/people/Mings/sounds/386953/

Background ambience audio by Rainer Weston.
